newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian castor prices extend gains, arrivals fall.
newsitem.headline: Indian castor prices extend gains, arrivals fall.

text.p: Indian castor prices for December delivery extended gains on Wednesday on fresh speculative buying and lower arrivals, dealers said.
"Fresh export enquiries for castoroil also triggered fresh bull buying," one dealer said.

Castorseed arrivals from Gujarat region fell to 6-7,000 bags (75 kg each) against 10-12,000 bags on Tuesday. Groundnut oil rose to 435/437 rupees per 10 kg from 432/433 on buying for the festival season. In Rajkot spot oil was steady at 680/685 rupees per 15 kg. The castor trade is shut on Thursday for a local holiday. Trading will resume on Friday.
